feed.title: Alex Tsaptsinos
feed.subtitle: **Alex Tsaptsinos**, Stanford ICME MS Student Music, Machine Learning, Football

entry.title: Genetic Algorithms at Shazam
entry.content:
I spent this last summer working at Shazam as part of their R&D team in Redwood City. I wrote a blog post detailing the project I worked on here.

It was a great summer within an awesome team!
entry.summary: I spent this last summer working at Shazam as part of their R&D team in Redwood City. I wrote a blog post detailing the project I worked on here.
